sanskrit_verses.sanskrit: शौचे संहरणे लोम्नां पादत्रच्छ्त्रधारणे । गुणा मात्राशितीयेऽस्मिंस्तथोक्ता दण्डधारणे
sanskrit_verses.transliteration: śauce saṃharaṇe lomnāṃ pādatracchtradhāraṇe | guṇā mātrāśitīye'smiṃstathoktā daṇḍadhāraṇe
sanskrit_verses.translation: When cleansing, removing hair, and wearing a foot-covering. The virtues in this third quantity are also said to be in the hold of the rod
